Articles.Content:
I started playing in science mode yesterday, today while playing the game crashed mid mission. When I restarted the game I noticed my rocket couldn't fly anymore due to locked parts, as it turns out two of my science nodes had reset themselves without refunding me in any form

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T14:30:07Z" title="06/01/2015 02:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by EthanSchlegel**

If you do alt+f12 (modifier key + f12) it will bring up the debug menu, and you can unlock science nodes from there. If you're doing science mode out of the enjoyment of challenge and having objectives, I would advise against cheating further.
Thanks for the help, and no I don't plan on cheating further science mode is too fun to cheat
